posts.content:
Hi Folks.

I want to put a table in my bus, something I can remove when I put the R n R bed down but it can stay up at all other times. Can I buy the hinges and things to attached it to the side of the van and for a folding leg?

Any help appreciated, I know JK do some metal ones but they're not exactly in keeping with the style of the van...

Cheers
Julian

Just in case anyone stumbles across this looking for the same I found this company online and they've been brilliant. They supply all sorts of period type parts, at least to my untrained eye

http://www.caravan-supplies.co.uk/
